name: AireBrush Round One-Step Volumizing Hair Dryer Brush
about: What it is:A volumizing hair-dryer brush with superior drying power for faster styling with less damage and bouncy, salon-level blowouts in one easy step..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Uniform heat and even airflow for fast drying that helps protect hair's natural moisture.What Else You Need to Know:T3 EvenFlow Technology ensures exceptional heat precision and even airflow to cut styling time in half** while protecting hair's natural moisture. A two-and-a-half-inch round brush design with a CeraGlossâ„¢ ceramic surface works to build volume at the roots and detail ends for gorgeous waves and bends. EvenStream vents equalize airflow for rapid drying with less damage,* and three heat and two speed settings deliver total styling personalization for healthy results on all hair types.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use a towel or allow hair to air-dry until it is free of any excess moisture..-Thoroughly detangle hair..-Use clips to divide hair into three-to-four-inch sections before styling..-For voluminous blowouts, place brush under hair, close to the roots, and roll outward to the ends. .-For extra lift at the roots, hold the brush under the roots for two to three seconds..-To create bends and curls at the ends, place the brush under the ends of each section, rotate inward or outward, and hold for two to three seconds..-After each section is dry, hit the Cool Shot to lock in your look.
